author: Nintendo of America
description:
The Breach update for No Man’s Sky is available now. Free for existing players on Nintendo Switch 2 and Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/no-mans-sky-nintendo-switch-2-edition-switch-2/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=P1057-01&utm_id=P1057-01  

Uncover the tragic fate of the lost Fireship Arcadia corvette ship in this all-new update. Journey through the purple-star solar systems and experience the spookier side of the No Man's Sky universe. Salvage the wreck of the mysterious corvette, earn exclusive ship parts to use in your own ship creations, and more! 

#NintendoSwitch2 #NintendoSwitch #NoMansSky 


Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://ninten.do/6008Spp2s

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

title: No Man's Sky – Breach Update – Nintendo Switch 2
